channel.title: Soup on Nhuyhoa Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Soup on Nhuyhoa Recipes

item.title: Banh Canh (Vietnamese Thick Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit banh canh chicken bones bean sprouts fish sauce chicken feet chives msg chicken wings cilantro pepper dried shrimp daikon salt dried squid garlic shallot oil pork belly ginger sugar pork bones green onions wonton soup base pork feet hanh kho pork hock onion pork rib tips shallot shrimp vietnamese coriander

item.title: Broth
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit fish sauce chicken bones daikon date msg chicken feet dried shitake mushrooms pepper chicken wings garlic salt dried shrimp ginger sugar dried squid green onions wonton soup base pork belly onion pork bones shallot pork feet pork hock pork shoulder

item.title: Bun Mang Vit (Vietnamese Duck Noodle Soup with Bamboo Shoot)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun duck bamboo shoots chicken broth cilantro pepper ginger salt green onions wonton soup base shallot Instructions instructions Defrost and clean duck with salt and water Cut off the duck head, cut open stomach and take out internal organs Slice duck by thighs to make it easier to cook Marinate duck with salt, pepper, and minced shallots Add duck and parts to boiling water, use just enough water to just cover the duck Peel and smash ginger, add to pot Boil duck on medium or low heat with the cover on, want a light boil for a total of 1 hour Periodically skim off foam and remove clumps Can check on status by stabbing chicken in breast/thigh with chopstick and ensuring there are no red streaks Take out duck and cut up the meaty parts, put bony parts back into broth Maintain a slow boil of broth, add chicken broth to desired level and add wonton soup base Adjust broth to taste, should taste salty Slice bamboo shoots into strips and clean Blanche bamboo strips Add bamboo into broth Cut up duck and refrigerate Serve bun with duck, green onions, cilantro, broth, and nuoc mam pha with ginger

item.title: Bun Rieu (Vietnamese Crab Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun eggs bean sprouts chicken broth ground chicken cilantro crab paste ground pork green onions mam tom shrimp lettuce salt tofu mint wonton soup base tofu puffs onion shallot tofu puffs tomato water spinach

item.title: Canh Bau (Opo Squash Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth pork rib tips cilantro fish sauce shrimp green onions mushroom seasoning opo squash pepper shallot salt Instructions instructions Season meat with salt, pepper, and shallots Season squash (cut into strips or cubes) with salt and pepper Saute minced shallots until slightly golden Stir in meat and squash Add water/broth, adjust to taste with various seasonings Simmer for 5-10 min In last few minutes, add green onions and cilantro

item.title: Canh Ca Chua Dau Hu (Tofu and Tomato Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam fish tofu cilantro wonton soup base pork rib tips green onions tofu onion tofu puffs shallot tomato Instructions instructions Heat yellow onion, shallots, and tomatoes in pot on medium heat When tomatoes have softened, add 1 bowl of water Add tofu (fried if desired), soy puffs, pork chops, or fish tofu Add wonton soup base and nuoc mam, adjust to taste Simmer for 15 minutes Add cilantro, green onions, etc in last few minutes

item.title: Canh Cai Cuc (Chrysanthemum Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth ground chicken chrysanthemum wonton soup base ground pork shallot Instructions instructions Saute minced shallots until slightly golden Stir fry ground pork until no longer pink Add an equal amount of water and chicken broth Season with wonton soup base Adjust broth to taste, want it light Cut chrysanthemums (cai cuc, tung ho) into 3 in lengths, use the stems if they are tender enough Add steams first then leaves Bring to a small simmer and then remove from heat

item.title: Canh Cha Ca (Fish Cake Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam cha ca (fish paste) dill wonton soup base green onions onion shallot tomato Instructions instructions Heat yellow onion, shallots, and tomatoes in pot on medium heat When tomatoes have softened, add 1 bowl of water Add cha ca Add wonton soup base and nuoc mam, adjust to taste Simmer for 15 minutes Add dill and green onions in the last few minutes

item.title: Canh Chua Ca (Sweet and Sour Fish Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam catfish bean sprouts pineapple pepper elephant ear stem salt garlic sugar green onions tamarind okra rice paddy herbs tomato

item.title: Canh Dua Chua (Pickled Mustard Green Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth beef rough flank dua chua nuoc mam pha pork belly shallot wonton soup base tomato Instructions instructions Stir minced shallots until golden in a pot on medium heat Put in thinly sliced meat (leave beef flanks in large strips) and stir for about 5 min, want it mostly cooked Add in a little bit of water and simmer for 5-10 min on low Mix in sliced tomatoes and dua cha Stir well for a few minutes Put in 2:1 ratio of chicken broth and water, may also add dua chua liquid of desired Add wonton soup base When soup starts to boil, turn to low, cover with lid and let it sit for 20 min Add nuoc mam pha Adjust to taste, want it sweet and sour

item.title: Canh Khoai Mo (Ube Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth shrimp rice paddy herbs pepper shallot salt ube wonton soup base Instructions instructions Process peeled shrimp, salt, pepper, and shallots Saute minced shallots until slightly golden Add shrimp mixture Add chicken broth and wonton soup base Bring to a boil, then lower heat Add mashed ube (khoai mo bao) and simmer Add rice paddy herbs (ngo om) in the last few minutes

item.title: Canh Khoai Tay Suon (Taro and Pork Rib Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth pork rib tips japanese sweet potato macaroni rice paddy herbs pepper shallot salt taro wonton soup base Instructions instructions Marinate the pork rib tips with salt and pepper Golden minced shallots Add one layer of pork and sear both sides until golden; do not crowd pan, use multiple batches if needed Add water or chicken broth and adjust to medium high heat Add sweet potato and boil until cooked If cooking with taro, boil in a separate pot due to shorter cooking time Add wonton soup base, adjust to taste Add rice paddy herbs (ngo om) in the last few minutes Eat with rice or nui

item.title: Canh Muop Mong Toi (Spinach and Luffa Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit pepper dried shrimp malabar spinach salt shallot wonton soup base taiwanese okra Instructions instructions Soak dried shrimp in hot water and mash dried shrimp Stir fry taiwanese okra (luffa) & shallots with salt & pepper Add bowl of dried shrimp & additional water Add wonton soup base Add malabar spinach prior to boiling Adjust to taste as necessary Canh spoils easily, so refridgerate when cool

item.title: Canh Rau Ram
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth beef shank onion pepper rau ram salt shallot wonton soup base Instructions instructions Slice shanks and season with salt and pepper Golden shallots and onions Sear meat Add water and adjust to taste with various seasonings Simmer until cooked Add chopped raw ram in last few minutes

item.title: Chao (Porridge)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit gio chao quay chicken green onions jasmine rice shallot pepper salt wonton soup base Instructions instructions Marinate chicken with salt, pepper & shallots Make rice Boil chicken until sufficient internal temp Add rice and boil until it has expanded (~1 hr) Add wonton soup base Eat with pepper, green onions, shredded chicken, gio chao quay

item.title: Ga Ca Ri (Vietnamese Chicken Curry)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit baguette chicken carrot chicken broth corn chicken powder garlic curry powder ginger pepper lemongrass salt potato wonton soup base shallot sweet potato

item.title: Mi Hoanh Thanh (Wonton Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth ground pork bok choy mi pork xa xiu chives oyster sauce shrimp cilantro pepper green onions salt hanh kho sesame oil mustard greens soy sauce shallot sugar water chestnuts wonton soup base wonton wrappers

item.title: Mi Vit Quay (Roast Duck Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth roast duck chives mi hanh kho wonton soup base lettuce mustard greens Instructions instructions Buy a whole roast duck at a Chinese barbecue restaurant Cut up the roast duck, save the bony parts for the broth and refrigerate the rest Fill large pot 1/4 full with water, add bony duck parts, and sauce (comes with duck) When the broth starts to boil, fill 3/4 pot with chicken broth and add wonton soup base Want the broth to maintain a light boil Wash and cut veggies Boil the lettuce and mustard greens Stir fry washed/dried mi until it is a little crunchy, sprinkle with some soy sauce and chives Eat with mi, veggies, roast duck, broth, and hanh kho

item.title: Mien Ga (Vietnamese Chicken Glass Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit fish sauce chicken bones chives date mien chicken feet cilantro msg chicken gizzard dried fungus mushroom pepper chicken thigh garlic salt ginger shallot oil green onions sugar hanh kho wonton soup base onion shallot vietnamese coriander

item.title: Miso Soup
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit dashi tofu green onions miso any seaweed paper any Instructions instructions Boil 4 cups water & 2 tsp of dashi granules Hydrate seaweed paper in warm water Reduce heat to medium and add meats/veggies & seaweed Remove from heat and mix in 3 tbsp of blended miso Garnish with green onions

item.title: Nui (Macaroni Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit macaroni pork rib tips mustard greens pepper shallot salt wonton soup base Instructions instructions Make pork broth with pork rib tips Boil mustard greens in pork broth Make macaroni noodles separately Eat noodles with pork, greens, and broth
